MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns, affecting properties in Cranshaws and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.39PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.11PM on 05 December 2020.
